text: José Ángel Espinoza Aragón (October 2, 1919 - November 6, 2015), also known as Ferrusquilla, was a Mexican singer-songwriter and movie actor. He was the father of actress Angélica Aragón.Biographical Dictionary "E", retrieved November 4, 2010. He also was a composer working with the SACM (Society of Authors and Composers of Mexico) He was known for his roles in House of Evil and in Two Mules for Sister Sara. He was born in Mazatlán, Sinaloa. Espinoza died in Mexico City, Mexico from pneumonia, aged 96.Muere el compositor y actor José Ángel Espinoza 'Ferrusquilla' ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican singer-songwriters Category:People from Sinaloa
title: José Ángel Espinoza
